evidence.text: denied Plaintiffs’ motion for preliminary injunctive relief and dismissed the case for lack of jurisdiction and failure to state a claim

evidence.text: prohibits Defendants from re-obligating or otherwise diminishing the sums awarded but terminated under Plaintiffs’ grant agreements. This Order shall remain in effect until October 1, 2025.
